title: 9 Asian American Jews speak
message:
In partnership with Rabbi Mira Rivera of Romemu in New York, N.Y., we’ve asked nine Asian American Jewish leaders to share their experiences in this painful time, as well as thoughts on how American Jews can and should offer support to the Asian American community.
The Jewish community must stand tall and proud in solidarity with Asian American communities everywhere, and with meaningful recognition of those in our own community who are both Asian and Jewish.
The identities, voices and work of Asian Jews must be elevated to more than just a footnote.
There are incredible stories out there shared by Asian American Jews, such as through LUNAR: The Jewish-Asian Film Project.
To share your own experiences as an Asian American Jew, contact interim opinion editor Talya Zax at [email protected] or opinion intern Zachariah Sippy at [email protected].
